blocks.name: clsp
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the limsup function.

blocks.name: df-limsup
blocks.content: Define the superior limit of an infinite sequence of extended real numbers. Definition 12-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 175. See ~ limsupval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 11-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: limsupgord
blocks.content: Ordering property of the superior limit function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupgord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))))
  mpisyl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)), wss(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wss(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wss(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  ixxss1(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, cle, c1, cico, cpnf, cico, cle, clt, cle)
  df-ico(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrletr(c0, c1, cv(hs3))
  imass2(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf), c2)
  ssrin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  mpbi(wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), wbr(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  ax-mp(wbr(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wcel(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cxr))
  xrleid(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr), wcel(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cxr))
  supxrleub(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  ssralv(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))

  inss2(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  ax-mp(wcel(csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr))
  inss2(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  supxrcl(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  supxrleub(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), csup(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr))
}

blocks.name: limsupcl
blocks.content: Closure of the superior limit. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(clsp, c0), cxr))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(clsp, c0), cxr), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  ffvelrni(c0, universe, clsp, cxr)
  fmpti(hs0, clsp, universe, cxr, cinf(crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt))
  df-limsup(hs0, hs1)
  mp1i(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr), wf(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cr, cxr))
  fmpti(hs1, cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cr, cxr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  mp1i(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cxr), wss(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr))
  inss2(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  supxrcl(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  frn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cr, cxr)
  infxrcl(crn(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
}

  fmpti(hs1, (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <)), cr, cxr, sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <))
  eqid((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <)))
  mp1i(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <)‚àà ‚Ñù*, ((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*)‚äÜ ‚Ñù*)
  inss2((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû)), cxr)
  supxrcl(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*))
  frn((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <)), cr, cxr)
  infxrcl(ran((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ sup(((hs0 "(hs1[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
}

blocks.name: limsupval
blocks.content: The superior limit of an infinite sequence ` F ` of extended real numbers, which is the infimum of the set of suprema of all upper infinite subsequences of ` F ` . Definition 12-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 175. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2005.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(c2), cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsp, c0), cinf(crn(c2), cxr, clt)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, clsp, cinf(crn(c2), cxr, clt), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt))
  infeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt, crn(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cr, csup(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm limsuple(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s1))

  a1ii(wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  bitrd(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wbr(c2, cle, cinf(crn(c3), cxr, clt)))
  breq2d(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1), cinf(crn(c3), cxr, clt), w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))

  syl3anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cxr, universe))

  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  a1i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cxr, universe))
  xrex()
  fex2(c1, c0, cxr, universe, universe)

blocks.name: limsuplt
blocks.content: The defining property of the superior limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsuplt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(cfv(clsp, c1), clt, c2), wrex(s0, cr, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), clt, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cfv(clsp, c1), clt, c2), wrex(s0, cr, wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), clt, c2)), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  syl6bbr(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wn(wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  notbid(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  limsuple(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rexnal(s0, cr, wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wb(wbr(cfv(clsp, c1), clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)))), wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  syl(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cxr), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl3anc(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cxr, universe))
  simp2(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  3ad2ant1(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  a1i(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cxr, universe))
  xrex()
  fex2(c1, c0, cxr, universe, universe)
  limsupcl(c1, universe)
  xrltnle(cfv(clsp, c1), c2)
  rexbidva(s0, cr, w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anr(w3a(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wb(wbr(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), clt, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  ffvelrni(cv(s0), cr, c3, cxr)
  limsupgf(s1, c3, c1)
  simp3(wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  xrltnle(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c2)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wss(c0, cr), wf(c1, c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c1, c0, cxr)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí((limsup ` c1)[<]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(c3 ` s0)[<]c2)))

  notbid((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c2[‚â§](limsup ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2[‚â§](c3 ` s0)))

  syl3anc((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*), c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñù* ‚àà ùïå)
  simp2(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, (c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù, (c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  a1i((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù* ‚àà ùïå)
  xrex()
  fex2(c1, c0, cxr, universe, universe)
  limsupcl(c1, universe)
  xrltnle((limsup ` c1), c2)
  rexbidva(s0, cr, (c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (c3 ` s0)[<]c2, ¬¨ c2[‚â§](c3 ` s0))
  syl2anr((c0 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù ‚àß(c1 : c0 ‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ((c3 ` s0)[<]c2 ‚Üî ¬¨ c2[‚â§](c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0)‚àà ‚Ñù*, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  ffvelrni(s0, cr, c3, cxr)

blocks.name: limsupgre
blocks.content: If a sequence of real numbers has upper bounded limit supremum, then all the partial suprema are real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: limsupbnd1
blocks.content: If a sequence is eventually at most ` A ` , then the limsup is also at most ` A ` . (The converse is only true if the less or equal is replaced by strictly less than; consider the sequence ` 1 / n ` which is never less or equal to zero even though the limsup is.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: limsupbnd2
blocks.content: If a sequence is eventually greater than ` A ` , then the limsup is also greater than ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
